p: Previously, the medicinal use of turmeric has been demonstrated using in vivo studies, in which turmeric was administered in the form of a gel in an inflamed rat model [ 32, 33]. While working with turmeric oil, another study using a murine model in which inflammation was acutely induced by carrageenan and dextran and chronically by formalin reported a significant reduction in paw thickness in comparison with the standard drug used in the study [ 32].
